summary: the diversity of RNA viruses present in faeces of neonatal piglets suffering from diarrhoea has been evaluated by NGS. samples were selected among the cases submitted to the Veterinary Diagnostic Laboratories of Infectious Diseases of the Universitat Autnoma de Barcelona. 12917_2019_2204_MOESM1_ESM.docx (40.9KB, docx) Additional file 1: Summary of the 51 samples analyzed: name, origin, RNA viruses detected and number of reads indexed.
